description: Connection to InfluxDB with metrics from signalk and telegraf required

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "name")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "vessel")
  |> last()

import "math"

cardinal = (l, c) => {
    absolute = math.abs(x: l)
    degrees = math.floor(x: absolute)
    minutesNotTruncated = (absolute - degrees) * 60.0
    minutes = math.floor(x: minutesNotTruncated)
    seconds = math.floor(x: (minutesNotTruncated - minutes) * 60.0)
    return "${degrees}Â° ${minutes}' ${seconds}'' ${c}"
}

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "position")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lat" or r["_field"] == "lon")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.id == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
	|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["lat"] and exists r["lon"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "id", "navigation", "source"])
	|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: 
    if r["lat"]>0 and r["lon"]>=0 
      then (cardinal(l: r["lat"], c: "N") + " " + cardinal(l: r["lon"], c: "E"))
    else if r["lat"]>0 and r["lon"]<0
      then (cardinal(l: r["lat"], c: "N") + " " + cardinal(l: r["lon"], c: "W"))
    else if r["lat"]<0 and r["lon"]>0
      then (cardinal(l: r["lat"], c: "S") + " " + cardinal(l: r["lon"], c: "E"))
    else if r["lat"]<0 and r["lon"]<0
      then (cardinal(l: r["lat"], c: "S") + " " + cardinal(l: r["lon"], c: "W"))
    else
      " --- " 
	  }))
  |> rename(columns: {_field: "position"})

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "position")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.id == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["navigation"] == "trip")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.id == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1852.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["navigation"] == "throughwater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1852.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "signalk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "bucket")
  |> last()
list.name: signalk

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["id"])
  |> distinct(column: "id")
list.label: MMSI
list.name: mmsi

list.definition:
import "strings"
import "date"

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sunrise")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with sunrise: string(v: date.add(d: ${timezone}, to: time(v: uint(v: r._value)))) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: strings.substring(start: 11, end: strings.strlen(v: r.sunrise)-11, v: r.sunrise) }))
list.label: Sunrise
list.name: sunrise

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement != "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["source"])
  |> distinct(column: "source")
list.label: Sources
list.name: sources

  |> keep(columns: ["source"])
  |> distinct(column: "source")
